definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: The brisk style of Chen Yu-yi more or less shows that he learns to So Shi.
sentences.chinese: 陳風格之清麗，也或多或少地留下了學蘇的痕跡。

sentences.english: His artistic style is elegant and simple, full of poetic charm.
sentences.chinese: 他的藝術格調清麗簡約，雅俗之間，充滿詩情畫意。

sentences.english: The verse performance of Yuxi Liu is combination of two kinds art style: "bold and unconstrained" and "lucid and attractive".
sentences.chinese: 劉禹錫的詩歌表現爲豪健與清麗兩種藝術風格的結合。

sentences.english: Bamboo flower is beautiful, is the kind of Qingli refined beauty.
sentences.chinese: 竹花很美，是那種清麗脫俗的美。

sentences.english: Her clear and elegant writing sets her apart from other journalists.
sentences.chinese: 她的文章清麗典雅，比其他記者高出一籌。

sentences.english: I like reed, like her charming inverted image in water, makes the water more beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡蘆葦，喜歡它在水中清麗的倒影，使水也更美了。

sentences.english: Crab apple flowers stand besides Yulan flowers shyly, red plumb and green thin, cute after rain.
sentences.chinese: 悄立其後的是海棠花，紅肥綠瘦，雨後清麗。

sentences.english: Be it rich, be it plain, gladly accept the true colors of life with delight.
sentences.chinese: 容或妖豔，容或清麗，欣然接受生命真情的彩妝。

sentences.english: Expression in lines Qingli simple, direct feeling.
sentences.chinese: 在線條的表達上簡潔清麗，感覺直接。

sentences.english: Compared to those of the Tang Dynasty, women's fashion in the Song Dynasty is simpler and unsophisticated.
sentences.chinese: 與唐代相比，宋代女子的服飾顯得較爲淡雅清麗。

sentences.english: No evil and sex, pure, beautiful and expensive and micah lets a person clinking endearment.
sentences.chinese: 無邪又縱慾，純真又彌貴，清麗並讓人無比鍾愛。

definition: mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
to touch up (a piece of writing)/to add details (to a painting)
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
